#include <cstdio>
#include <algorithm>
using namespace std;
typedef long long int LL;
LL arr[100005];
int main()
{
int t,n;
scanf("%d",&t);
while(t--)
{
    scanf("%d",&n);
    for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
        scanf("%lld",&arr[i]);
    sort(arr,arr+n);
    int i=0;
    LL cnt=1;
    if(n==1)
    {
        printf("YES\n");
        continue;
    }
    else
    {
      i=0;
      while(i<n && arr[i]<=cnt)
      {
          cnt+=arr[i];
          i++;
      }
      if(i==n)
        printf("YES\n");
      else
        printf("NO\n");
    }
}
return 0;
}
